attributes.action: Ask the England National Football Team manager to select David Nugent Of Preston North End Football Club in his next international squad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent performances by England now require urgent action.David Nugent is showing excellent form for both Preston North End and the England Under 21's team.The time has come for this exciting centre forward to be added to the England Senior team.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
